title: Standard, Top Floor, Available Now!!
posting_body: We are currently running a special!
If you apply for a two bedroom within 24 hours, we will waive the $75 application fee!
Woodridge Apartments is conveniently located between 6 and 7 Mile on Middlebelt Road, 2 miles from I-96 providing an easy commute to metro Detroit's major commercial and cultural centers.
Woodridge is nestled close to shopping centers, multiple fitness facilities and a variety of restaurants.
With some of the most exceptional amenities in the greater Detroit area, Woodridge provides the most premier living environment!
All 22 buildings have secured entry doors and a second level that features coin-operated laundry and additional in home storage for each apartment!
Each apartment is a very spacious corner unit with a lot of natural light!
You will have plenty of storage space throughout the home and all of your appliances do come with in your galley style kitchen!
You will have access to our play area, dog park and our seasonal outdoor swimming pool with a sundeck!
1 Bed/1 Bath- 810 Sqft
2 Bed/2 Bath- 920 Sqft
Residents are responsible for the 3 main utilities- water, gas and electric.
We cover your carport and trash costs!
Woodridge is pet friendly, allowing 2 pets per home and only breed restrictions apply!
We offer flexible lease terms ranging from 2 to 15 months and furnished units are an option!
Contact us for more information or check us out at <URL>!
Office Hours:
Monday and Friday: 9:00AM - 5:00PM
Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday: 9:00AM - 6:00PM
Saturday: 10:00AM - 3:00PM
Sunday: Closed
